metadata.title: CVE-2020-35521 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in libtiff. Due to a memory allocation failure in tif_read.c, a crafted TIFF file can lead to an abort, resulting in denial of service.

criterions.comment: tiff package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.0+git201212-1ubuntu1').
